title: Ysgramor's Tomb: Purity Path Ignites
session_summary: Elitrof led Kodlak, Farkas, and Vilkas north through Nightgate Pass (breaking a Silver Hand ambush with Fire Breath) to Ysgramor's Tomb. At the Harbinger Flame, the three Glenmoril Witch Heads were expended to cure Kodlak, Vilkas, and Farkas of the beast blood. Each wolf-spirit manifested and was destroyed. Kodlak privately signaled Elitrof as a future Harbinger candidate. Wuuthrad was reforged in the Reliquary. Fire Breath Mastery advanced to 4/8. Companions remaining with beast blood: Aela and Skjor.
